trans-unit.source: Exception class to indicate that the recipient certificate was not valid.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示接收方证书无效的异常类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它包含对异常原因进行解释的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException" /> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，它保存有关要引发的异常的序列化对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException" /> class using the specified serialization information and serialization context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的序列化信息和序列化上下文来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它包含对异常原因进行解释的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The original exception that caused this exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 导致引发此异常的原始异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException" /> class with the specified error message and the original exception that caused this exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和导致引发此异常的原始异常来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.IdentityValidationException" /> 类的新实例。
